reference.title: Display of MT Job Info in Folder Properties Summary

section.p: The folder properties summary window shows any available MT job information:

fig.title: MT job info in Folder Properties window

image.alt: Figure shows MT job info in Folder Properties window

section.p: The "Total words processed for MT" line lists the total number of words which have been processed in the analysis. This word count is the number of words for which there is no exact match in the translation memory databases.

The "Words send to the MT server" line lists the total number of words of the segments send to the MT server. This word count may less than the "Total words processed for MT" number as segments may have been filtered due to the specified filter conditions or because the inline tagging of the some of the segments is not support by the MT system.
The "Words received from the MT server" line lists the total number of words of the segments received from the MT server.
